topic.fullpath: Topic :: Formats and Protocols :: Data Formats

name: conversion of jpg files to ascii text
short_description: This is a jpeg2ascii converter that does not use the aalib which make it small, fast, and lightweight enough to be included for use as a viewer in the latest code for the popular and near ubiquitous lesspipe.sh utility.
